note: Carbon rail version requires additional Carbon Rail Adapter Kit
Not compatible with carbon rail version
Requires extra .375" spacer on top cage screw
Requires Seatpost with 10mm Hole (Cervelo, Argon 18, Scott, etc)
Must mount on horizontal portion of rail
Due to the various models within this series, XLAB will need to see your personal saddle model in order to help with saddle compatibility.
